game.name: Sus Virus Amogus
game.shortDescription: Sus Virus Amogus는 SF 액션 로그라이크 게임입니다. 무한한 우주 정거장에서 길을 잃은 과학자가 적대적인 군인과 로봇과 싸우며 독특한 효과를 가진 무작위 무기를 사용해 정거장의 더 깊은 곳으로 나아갑니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sus Virus Amogus is a sci-fi action-roguelike game. A lost scientist on an endless space station battles hostile soldiers and robots, using random weapons with unique effects to progress deeper into the station.

reviewHighlights.text: This game has been review bombed by bots but to make it look better. It definitely isn't worth the price and feels more like a demo rather than a full...
